import React, {useState} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { createRecipe } from "../actions"; import { ReactReduxContext, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; export default function CreateRecipe(){ let dispatch = useDispatch(); const[input,setInput] = useState({ name:"", dishtype: "", healthscore: "", image:"", summary: "", steps: "", diets: [] }) const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); let rdo = dispatch(createRecipe(input)); console.log(dispatch.payload) setInput({ name:"", dishtype: "", healthscore: "", image:"", summary: "", steps: "", diets: [] }) } const handleChange=(e)=>{ // console.log(e) // console.log([e.target.name]) // console.log([e.target.value]) setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } const handleChangeB=(e)=>{ if(e.target.checked){ setInput({ ...input, diets:[...input.diets, e.target.name] }) }else{ setInput({ ...input, diets:input.diets.filter(d => d !== e.target.name) }) } } return(

Create new recipe

Diets:
If you don´t know which diet your recipe corresponds to, please check here
) }
